trans-unit.source: Specifies how to draw the gradient outside a gradient brush's gradient vector or space.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在漸層筆刷的漸層向量或空間外繪製漸層。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示可用的模式方法以及它們的影響上<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>。

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.

A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>屬性。
![不同的 GradientSpread 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "不同的 GradientSpread 設定")

trans-unit.source: The color values at the ends of the gradient vector fill the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: 漸層向量端點的色彩值會填滿剩餘的空間。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the reverse direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 以相反方向重複漸層，直到空間填滿為止。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the original direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 以原始方向重複漸層，直到空間填滿為止。
